front.title: IEEE Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks--Media Access Control (MAC) Service Definition - Corrigendum 1: Logical Link Control (LLC) Encapsulation EtherType
front.abstract: This corrigendum to IEEE Std 802.1ACâ„¢-2016 corrects the value of the LLC Encapsulation EtherType.(The PDF of this standard is available at no cost to you compliments of the IEEE GET program https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/browse/standards/get-program/page/series?id=68)
